messages.messageContent:
Huge commotion in the kibbutz.
Security issues.

Stay locked indoors.
No walking around allowed.
All over the country....

Big mess in in Kfar Aza.
Very.

They infiltrated with paragliders
It's on TV we can see them on an open pickup truck shooting in the streets
This is a message from Sderot.

They’re going to upload photos from the fighting in Jewish communities on WhatsApp
CENSORED
. Do not open them, it will hack your phone within 10 seconds, and there's no way to stop it.
Share this warning with your family and friends.
It was mentioned on TV: cyber attacks against us are starting from multiple directions.

Hello everyone, I spoke with CENSORED and there's room for everyone in Shefayim. I've arranged transportation.
If You're interested, please let me know so I can update CENSORED
CENSORED
CENSORED
CENSORED
CENSORED

Dear friends.
This is the hardest day of our family’s life.
We've lost our most precious loved ones.
Our beloved CENSORED were found dead in their home.
Their sons CENSORED are still missing.
The destroyed and shattered kibbutz, physically and mentally, will never be the same as it was.
We're all 'on the edge'
The quality group we travel with is one big united family. Love and support without limits.
Our resilience and togetherness will help us get through these hours, days, weeks, and months in the best way possible.
Huge thanks to CENSORED and Briza company without you we couldn't finish this surreal journey where 33 people were saved from hell and got their lives back
Love you
CENSORED
CENSORED you moved us deeply. We can't stop crying. We'll hug you as tightly as we can. I believe I speak for everyone.

Thank you.
It's an absolute Holocaust.
Speechless, no words... We'll continue to stand by you wherever you are - we're with you, all of our hearts are with you!!!
I'm heartbroken.

CENSORED we're heartbroken too.
We'll do everything we can to continue being a united community and we'll hold you close and support you and every member of the community.
CENSORED no words, just pain. Thinking of you

CENSORED
Good and beloved people,
We're with you and here for you.
Our hearts ache, our souls are crying,
The mind can't comprehend.
Crazy....
We're to help, to hug and support you in any way possible.
We love you.
Stay strong.🙏
I'm heartbroken, stay strong CENSORED
Love you... with all my heart...

CENSORED
Lovelies
Always with you and for you.
Stay strong.
Dear CENSORED
Dear CENSORED
Stay strong
We're always here with you.🙏

CENSORED We share your pain and the heartbreak you've been struck with.
We also feel CENSORED's pain and CENSORED's, and our hearts are broken too.

Dear CENSORED, I’m holding you in my heart and sharing in your grief and sorrow. Wishing you strength on this incredibly difficult day. I hope and truly believe that you’ll find the inner strength and resilience to face this unimaginable loss.

CENSORED. These days have been filled with pain and anger and helplessness in face of hatred.
We’re hugging you from afar and praying for the boys’ safe return. 🙏

Good evening CENSORED dear friends... CENSORED... We came here 23 years ago, and we’re grateful for every moment spent with you. This is where we grew up with CENSORED, where our wonderful children grew up. where we became family with CENSORED. And in a blink, everything was brutally cut short. We lost our loved ones. CENSORED and CENSORED are still missing. Thank you, dear group... Thank you for the support acceptance, and love. Thank you CENSORED, for your kindness, sensitivity. and calmness. And thank you, CENSORED for a wonderful trip during such hardships... you are all wonderful people, thank you for being with us. Sending hugs to everyone... CENSORED

My words fall short in the face of this horror, of the loss of young lives.
All that remains is the deep love I have for all of you, and the belief that only our life force, our shared resilience, and the good we do can overcome this evil. Hugging you all.

CENSORED family
CENSORED family
My heart is with you and I can't stop crying. It’s simply hell on earth. I'm here for you whenever you need. May you find comfort from above.

Thank you very much CENSORED.
It's very hard for us.
We can't put it into words.

CENSORED family
We just spent 24 hours hoping and waiting with you, and now you’ve received the worst news. CENSORED and I are sending you love, strength, and standing with you in your grief. This loss is unbearable. You’ve lost two incredible children, beloved and successful grandchildren, and a remarkable family. Life is no longer what it was yesterday. But you are strong families, and you have children and grandchildren who will stand by you. We are here for you, always, for anything you need. Stay strong. We love you.
CENSORED

CENSORED family and CENSORED family
I simply don't know what to say. I believe these moments are for sending sincere condolences. Please accept ours.
CENSORED.

We just received an update about CENSORED
There's been identification of CENSORED and one of the girls. Probably CENSORED but not confirmed.
CENSORED and the 3 children are still missing and officially.
defined by the army as missing.
Maybe there's a slight glimmer of hope.
It's very hard for us.
Fingers crossed
fingers" crossed!!!

Of course, we’re taking the information with the utmost caution..
Everything is still uncertain.
Stay strong and courageous!!!
If only our prayers would be answered, and they’d be found safe and well
From me too.

For us, until there’s ironclad information, everything remains uncertain.
If only.
Wishing for the best

It's hard for me to ask God for help, CENSORED
Let's just hope.
Sending you strength to get through this, even with all the uncertainty.

Update CENSORED,
CENSORED wasn’t murdered apparently, she ran when the terrorists entered the house. CENSORED found her crying on the path and brought her to their home.
CENSORED and the children were taken captive, and it seems CENSORED is with them.
Let's pray🙏🙏🙏

Fingers crossed and hoping for good news. Stay strong CENSORED
CENSORED
